txt.en: 'I wonder how far it is to... where we're going?'
'It would be the worst kind of punishment to be left behind!'
'I have listened to a few of the stories and seen some of the maps that Gandalf and Elrond have been looking over.'
'It would be the worst kind of punishment to be left behind. I hope Lord Elrond doesn't change his mind and send some Elf-lord.'
